scripts.frontBuild: cd ./udagram/udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.backBuild: cd ./udagram/udagram-api && npm run build && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.frontTest: cd ./udagram/udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.backTest: cd ./udagram/udagram-api && npm run test && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.frontDeploy: cd ./udagram/udagram-frontend && aws s3 cp --recursive --acl public-read ./www s3://udagram-project/ && cd .. && cd ..
scripts.backDeploy: cd ./udagram/udagram-api &&  eb init udagram-api --platform node.js --region us-east-1 && eb deploy udagram-api-dev&& cd .. && cd ..
